rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if each opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
[i]“Seeing my world from my satellite really puts my plans into perspective.”
—Aldorus Fin, vice president[/i]
notes:
Heaven Knows — The Pretty Reckless
!done !exportname Heaven Knows
